reviewText: Another great installment to this series. However, the quality issues(mainly picture) drag this down a bit. Don't let that stop you, though, as the action makes up fort the few fights with bad picture.
bad sound and image quality, the main idea of the dvd (the fights) are great! if you are into the sport then you need this!
very good. very entertaining except for one fight that went to double overtime. But I def enjoyed this dvd
